org.jcouchdb.db
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
          org.jcouchdb.db.Options
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
public class Options
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>

Used to pass query options to view queries. For example: 

 database.queryView("company/all", Map.class, new Options().count(1).descending(true);

Author:
shelmberger
See Also:
Database.getDocument(Class, String), Database.queryView(String, Class, Options, JSONParser), Database.queryAdHocView(Class, String, Options, JSONParser), Serialized Form
